# About Me

I am a PhD candidate at the [Chair for Personnel Economics](https://cd.wiso.uni-koeln.de/de/team/personalwirtschaftslehre) at University of Cologne and a member of [C-SEB](https://c-seb.de/). My research covers topics in personnel economics and managerial accounting, such as employee development and incentives. I cooperate extensively with public and private organizations where I conduct field experiments, longitudinal surveys and analyze performance data.

You can find me current CV [here](https://leonhardgrabe.github.io/cv/)

My email is: [grabe\[at\]wiso.uni-koeln.de]{.underline}
